summary: THE POWER STEERING IS LOCKING UP. I RESEARCHED AND FOUND THAT THERE WAS A RECALL FOR THIS ISSUE HOWEVER I'M BEING TOLD THERE IS  NO RECALL FOR MY VEHICLE. MY WHEEL PULLS TO THE LEFT AND THEN AFTER A FEW MILES THE POWER STEERING GOES OUT. I HAVE TO RESTART THE VEHICLE ONLY TO HAVE THE SAME THING HAPPEN AGAIN.
